name: icelight-duckdb-container
description: DuckDB API server for Cloudflare Container

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --external:@duckdb/node-api --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
